name: Rotator (itch) (Ling Peiyu)
description:
This is my second project in Aalto University's Game Design and Production Program. 

Rotator is a Top-down shooting game in which players can use view rotation ability to change the level to beat enemies and solve puzzles. The player will be a hero in the game who will defeat evil creatures and find the truth behind his journey.

 Credits:

Producer: Ken Oshiro

Artist: Yuxuan Liu

Game Designer, Programmer: Jinda Li

Level Designer, Programmer: Peiyu Ling

Combat Designer, Programmer: Wesley Wang

Sound Designer: Marija Šumarac

The page in Aalto University's account: https://aalto-gamedesign.itch.io/rotator
